input_text.Prompt:
Write a brief product description making use of the given specs.

Product specification:
Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder, 8.5" x 11", Non-Glare Lense, Double Sided (Black)

Product features:
Adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1"
Set of 5
Holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert between non-glare lenses!
Features a shovel base that is flat
Displays2go SKU#: SH8511BKP
input_text.Response A:
Sure thing! Here's a brief product description that's safe and appropriate for a child:

"Hey there! Do you need to hold up some signs? These cool sign holders can help! They're adjustable, so you can make them taller or shorter. They're made of super strong plastic, and they have special lenses that make it easy to see the signs. They even have a flat bottom so they won't tip over! You get five of them, so you can use one for each side of your room or table. They're perfect for holding up important notes or pictures. Get ready to show off your signs in style!"

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
